title: LOL CRASHES AFTER CHAMP SELECT :'( AGAIN AND AGAIN AND AGAIN!!!!!!!!!!!!
body:
I have fixed this issue but i have to fix it every time i restart my computer also the crash is like only a half crash so after champ select the loading screen pops up then instantly minimizes if i click on the tab at the bottom of my desktop it will pop up and then minimize instantly again i can hear in game sounds but i cant see it!!!!!! i have fixed this by deleting logitech files then deleting lol launcher file running repair then restarting my lol then works . . . . .but that fix is no longer working so i have the above issue and cant fix pls HELP ME !!!!
 {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Are you on Mac or Windows?

Wait, weren't you the guy that helped the other guy with the same issue? Did you solve your own problem as well, or are you still experiencing this?

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ubnYUUvk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-20T09:24:25.693+0000)
>
> Are you on Mac or Windows?
> 
> Wait, weren't you the guy that helped the other guy with the same issue? Did you solve your own problem as well, or are you still experiencing this?

yeah i helped the guy but this is a fix i had to implement on every restart i re-installed and it still had the issue but when i copied a friends LOL the issue was fixed????? XD

Hm, whatever works, I guess. I wonder if simply repairing the client would have netted the same results.

Keep me informed of any complications you have in the future.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ubnYUUvk,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-21T04:53:31.539+0000)
>
> Hm, whatever works, I guess. I wonder if simply repairing the client would have netted the same results.
> 
> Keep me informed of any complications you have in the future.

will do but just to let you know I had to run the repair on every restart not sure what the issue was
Were you forced to, or did you do it on your own tuition?

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ubnYUUvk,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-24T02:40:52.743+0000)
>
> Were you forced to, or did you do it on your own tuition?

well i had to otherwise lol wouldnt work

Ah, thank you for that.

Happy playing!
